Token.Abstract: This class manages the lifecycle of various runtime services that adopt the MBService protocol.
Returns the singleton instance of the service implemented by the class with the specified name.

Parameter.Name: serviceClassName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the class implementing the MBService protocol.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A pointer to the singleton MBService with the specified class name, or nil if there isn't one.

Token.Abstract: Returns the singleton instance of the service implemented the specified class.

Parameter.Name: serviceClass
Parameter.Abstract: The Class implementing the MBService protocol.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A pointer to the singleton MBService of the specified class, or nil if there isn't one.

Token.Abstract: Attaches to the specified service, incrementing its attach count by one.
Attaches to the service with the given class name, incrementing its attach count by one.

Parameter.Name: serviceClass
Parameter.Abstract: The implementing class of the service class to attach.

ReturnValue.Abstract: If successful, the MBService instance that was attached. Will return nil on failure.

Token.Abstract: Attaches to the service with the given class name, incrementing its attach count by one.

Parameter.Name: serviceClassName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the service class to attach.

ReturnValue.Abstract: If successful, the MBService instance that was attached. Will return nil on failure.

Token.Abstract: Detaches from the specified service, decrementing its attach count by one.
Detaches from the service with the given class name, decrementing its attach count by one.

Parameter.Name: serviceClass
Parameter.Abstract: The implementing class of the service class to detach.

ReturnValue.Abstract: If successful, the MBService instance that was attached. Will return nil on failure.

Token.Abstract: Detaches from the service with the given class name, decrementing its attach count by one.

Parameter.Name: serviceClassName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the service class to attach.

ReturnValue.Abstract: If successful, the MBService instance that was attached. Will return nil on failure.

Token.Abstract: Determines whether the specified service is running.

Parameter.Name: service
Parameter.Abstract: The service whose status is sought.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the service is running; NO if it is not.

Token.Abstract: Determines the current attach count of a service.

Parameter.Name: service
Parameter.Abstract: The service whose attach count is sought.
